text: The women's 100 metres event at the 1990 Commonwealth Games was held on 27 and 28 January at the Mount Smart Stadium in Auckland. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Merlene Ottey '''' |Kerry Johnson '''' |Pauline Davis '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification: First 5 of each heat (Q) and the next 3 fastest (q) qualified for the semifinals.
